name: Joel Fletcher
description:
'''Joel Fletcher Allan ''' (born 30 January 1992) is an Australian [[record producer]] and [[DJ]] from [[Melbourne]], who is best known for his 2013 remix of New Zealand rapper [[Savage (rapper)|Savage]]'s 2005 single "[[Swing (Savage song)|Swing]]", which charted in Australia and in New Zealand. In 2014, Fletcher was a support act for [[Avicii]]'s headline tour for the Melbourne and [[Brisbane]] dates. At the [[APRA Music Awards of 2015]], Fletcher won Dance Work of the Year for "Swing (Joel Fletcher Remix)", which was co-written by Fletcher, Demetrius Savelio (aka Savage), Nathan Holmes and Aaron Ngawhika.

In 2014, Fletcher embarked on a four-month tour of North America, called the Bounce Bus Tour, alongside [[Timmy Trumpet]] and [[Will Sparks]].
